title: A Blind child and a sighted child (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: University of Michigan. Audio-Visual Education Center, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blindness

description: Follows a blind and a sighted child through the sensori-motor period during the first year of life in an attempt to answer the following questions. How is this crucial period affected when one of the major senses is lacking? What are the pathways of progress for the blind infant? What are the limits set by his handicap?
